question: Last month, you travelled to another city. You told a friend who lives in the city that youwould meet them, but you did not. Write a letter to this friend. In your letter apologise for not meeting him/her explain why you did not contact him/her earlier suggest a time and place to meet in the future
text: Hope this letter finds you in pink of your health. As you know that I came to your city last month for one week ,unfortunately I was unable to meet you there due to some unavoidable circumstances.

I am sorry from the depth of my heart for not seeing you at your place. Basically, I was there to care for my maternal aunt who is in her last stage of cancer and received palliative care at home from nurses. As I promised her to stay with her for a few days, however, when I reach there, after 5 hours she passed away.

Apparently, I phoned my parents to reach there and attend all the death ceremonies for the last 7 days. This is the reason that I was not able to see you and get no time to write to you. I guess you will understand the whole condition. There was a sad moment for my mother and other family members that's why I have to be there to console them.

I am planning to come again there for the transfer of the property of my maternal aunt next week. It would be great if you could meet me. I would come there Wednesday so it would be ok to meet on Friday or Saturday evening. Write to me when you will be available so that I would plan accordingly.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma or two with the interrupter unfortunately. Consider adding the comma(s).
